MessagingSessionMetrics.name: MessagingSessionMetrics
MessagingSessionMetrics.description: Represents a metric gathered about a specific enhanced messaging session, such as average agent response time.

MessagingSessionId.description: The ID of the related messaging session.

MessagingSessionMetricType.description: The metric that this record captures.

MessagingSessionMetricValue.description: The value of the measured metric. For example, if the MessagingSessionMetricType is EndUserMessageCount, a MessagingSessionMetricValue of 12 means that the end user sent 12 messages during the messaging session.

Name.description: An autogenerated number identifying the MessagingSessionMetrics record.
